Description.Name: Repaired Mechbay
Description.Details: Enables to Drop 1 additional Mech or Tank. Half-done now, Boss. It's really starting to look like a proper dropship. I can get started on fabricating parts to assemble the final 2 cradles from scratch. Producing the parts in duplicate should save us a little time and money.

AssignedCastDescription: The cradles can be completed, but Sumire has some concerns. You should talk to her before trying to field a full extra lance, Boss.
